tracktor.main¶

Main module for Tracktor integration. This file is based on the original integration of Kitsu and Shotgrid made by the TIK Manager team.

class tik_tracktor.tracktor.main.ProductionPlatform(*args: Any, **kwargs: Any)¶

Bases: ManagementCore

Main class for Tracktor integration.

Handles authentication, project synchronization, and asset/shot management between Tik Manager and the Tracktor backend.

Some methods are left unimplemented, since they aren’t supported by current Tracktor’s functionality but are required by the TIK’s ManagementCore.

tik_main¶

The main Tik Manager object.

api¶

The Tracktor API client instance.

Type:

TracktorAPI or None

is_authenticated¶

Whether the user is authenticated.

Type:

bool

user¶

The username of the authenticated user.

Type:

str or None

authenticate()¶

Authenticates the user in Tracktor.

Returns:

(TracktorAPI instance or None, str message)

Return type:

tuple

Raises:

Exception – shows an error if authentication failed.

create_from_project(project_root, tracktor_project_id, set_project=True)¶

Creates a Tik Manager project from a Tracktor project.

Parameters:

  • project_root – The root directory for the new project.

  • tracktor_project_id (int) – The Tracktor project ID.

  • set_project (bool) – Whether to set the new project as active. Defaults to True.

Returns:

The path to the created project, or None if creation failed.

Return type:

Path or None

force_sync()¶

Forcefully synchronizes the current Tik Manager project with Tracktor.

Is a duplicate of the sync_project() function because of the ProductionPlatform inheritance

Returns:

(bool, str) indicating success and a message.

Return type:

tuple

get_all_assets()¶

This method is called when all assets are retrieved.

get_all_shots()¶

This method is called when all shots are retrieved.

get_available_status_lists(force=False)¶

This method is called when the available status lists are retrieved.

get_entity_url(entity_type, entity_id)¶

This method is called when the URL of an entity is retrieved.

get_projects()¶

Retrieves a list of projects from Tracktor.

Returns:

A list of project dictionaries.

Return type:

list

Raises:

Exception – If not authenticated.

static get_settings_ui()¶

Returns the UI settings for the Tracktor platform.

Returns:

A dictionary of settings UI configuration.

Return type:

dict

Returns:

The Tracktor host URL.

Return type:

str

property host_api¶

Returns the Tracktor API base URL.

logout()¶

Logs out the user from Tracktor and clears credentials.
